context: Are all the games multi hands???
response: No, you can choose the number of hands you want to play from one to100.

context: Does this case have enough room for the 3ds XL and a circle pad pro?
response: Yes I use it with mine

context: Can this be played with a keyboard and a mouse? Or is it best suited for gamepads?
response: It can be played with both.  Played through the first half with a keyboard and it was easy to play.  Switched to the Logitech F710 and it was still easy to play.

context: Does this come as a single CD key for both, or one for each?
response: 2 Origin keys: 1 for DA: Origin Ultimate,  1 for DA 2

context: What machine does this play on?
response: Just to clarify JS Powel's comment.  Some bases ARE interchangeable.  PS3 and PS4 bases are interchangeable so if you upgrade your system from the PS3 to the PS4, you would only have to buy the software I believe.

context: Does this remove HDCP? I'm trying to record gamplay footage with the elgato but HDCP is preventing that.
response: It does for some but not all devices.
It works well on ours.  Our Win 7 has XP mode, but as far as I know, the XP mode is not being used at all.

context: So this fits a Hori Tpu Case + a 3ds, and still fits?
response: Yes! I use it all of the time when I take it to school and it's great. I feel safe that it wont move around while in case or get face damage because the outer layer provides enough protection. Hope this helps!

context: Are the chat pad and headset wireless?
response: It pad connects to the bottom of the controller and the headset connects to the chat pad on the bottom.

context: Does this game have multiplayer mode?
response: Sorry, I have no idea. I bought it for my grandson and he loves it.

context: Noisy Typing? Keyboard looks cool, but I don't want loud clicking when I type.  Can you tell me if this is louder or quieter then your normal keyboard?  Or if it is silent like a laptop?
response: Razer has chosen, at least for the moment, to keep the stealth edition EXCLUSIVE to their online store.

context: I have some questions can you connect to ps3?| can you turn touchscreen off?
response: Yes you can connect to ps3 but ps4 is recommended and you can turn off the touch screen on some games but not the home screen

context: Is this Legendary Edition an actual standalone version of Skyrim, or is it an add-on where I would need to buy the original game as well?
response: It is everything. The stand alone game, plus all 3 expansions.

context: Compatible with Will U Remote Plus or the old Wii Remote Controller?
response: It works with the Wii plus controller as well as the other

context: Does it have the west indie cricket team?
response: Yes it does, many domestic teams as well

context: Has anyone used this with an Odyssey 400?
response: I do not have the Odyssey system, but it works with my Atari and Intellivision. I do not see any reason to doubt that it would not work, as the technology of that era was all the same. I always order extra, because you never know when a second one will be needed.

context: best controller for counterstrike? I am new topc gaming and am sick of typing to play counterstrike. What controller should I buy ?
response: http://forums.gamernode.com/showthread.php?t=21133They mention several options there, including the XBox 360 controller.
